reviews.review: If you need a reason why I am recommending this game, you offically live under a rock. Portal one, times a hundred.

is fun i get 2 shoot hole into another hole. is fun

Как всегда Valve подтверждают что они одни из самых талантливых разработчиков современных компьютерных игр. Они это доказывают год за годом на протяжении вот уже 15 лет. В этот раз нам посчастливилось увидеть очередной их шедевр - Portal 2. Каллосальный прорыв после предыдущего Portal, сюжетная линия длинее в три раза плюс ко всему этому весёлый кооператив. Игра доставляет и я считаю, в неё должен поиграть каждый.
Still Alive
Super interessante e interativo, com um toque de humor.
ITS JUST AWESOME!!!!!

It's Portal! Plus, you can make maps.

Look at how many hours I have played this. I am amazing.
Ok not really. Most of that is it idling while my 2 year old played.
Also he started with keyboard/mouse.
No, seriously I am not a troll.
Look, mostly he played maps I built.
Incrementaly increasing complexity. It was great.
He is 5 now and can beat all the guys in Mega Man X4.

the game is amazingly fun. and i'm talking about the single player mode! co-op mode is the best kind of puzzle game I've ever played! the game is not actually, "normal," it has fun gimmicks that have never been accomplished before. including the multiverse. lots of good humor, characters, and most of all, GLaDOS.
Read my recommendation for Portal. Multiply that statement x2, and then add the co-op function. If you like Portal then get this game.

Unique, challenging, immersive and above all, funny. Great writing, unique gameplay and brilliant design make for one of the best games ever made. And that's no hyperbole. Overall a real treat for the mind.

Portal 2 is a very fun and entertaining game. It contains both humor and challenging gameplay that requires the player to THINK. Second part of the game is very good, however it's not so challenging as the first part was. Anyway I highly recomemnd this game becouse it's deffinitely something better and more original then common "shot 'em up games".

It's not overly challenging, but sabotaging your friend(s) in weird ways is awesome, and is pretty hard to resist doing at least once. Or twice.

Alongside with Half Life franchise, this is one my most favorite games of all time. (This might actually be my MOST most favorite.) I just love the lore, the story, the characters, the game mechanics, everything.

If you've played the first one, then oh yes you need to play this game. Voice acting, story, gameplay and pretty much everything is much better in Portal 2. Let's just hope they come out with a 3rd one.
try it youll like it.

La segunda parte del ya clasico Portal... Una obra maestra... Un recorrido alocado por Aperture... Un guion excelente con puzzles que retan el ingenio... Glados y Weathley pasaron a la historia...

 The second part of the already classic Portal... A master piece... An insanity trip trough Aperture... An excelent script with puzzles that defy ingenuity, ... Glados and Weathley made history...

A worthy successor to the original, Portal 2 expands on the genius of the first game rather than trying to reinvent the wheel.  The puzzles are a bit easier than Portal's but still cleverly challenging enough to get your brain cooking as you search for the solution.  The physics are top-notch as always with Valve, but it's the story and voice-acting that really make this a classic.  GLADoS reprises her role as the snarky, evil supercomputer but there's also Wheatley, a well-meaning but bumbling and neurotic helper robot who sounds like he comes direct from a sitcom like The Office.  Mere voiceovers tell an intriguing and humorous story, and Wheatley's baleful single lens "eye" conveys more emotion than many Hollywood actors.  Give your brain a workout and your heart a laugh with this brilliant gem of a game.

This is a great game! Not only are the puzzles intriguing, but the second half has very interesting, more platformer type gameplay. The plot is excellent, graphics immersive, characters wonderfully built. The ending is fantastic. Worth EVERY PENNY.
Il gioco che metterà a dura prova i tuoi neuroni :D
very nice and fun game with a great story plot and surprises

Amazing game! You'll spend a lot of hours with this game. Fantastic gameplay and well directed story. Real fun waits in CO-OP campaign. Now with map editor and additional maps from gamers..hours of your life will pass.

A very awesome game! If you played Portal 1 too, you'll certainly enjoy the storyline. The co-op is also VERY fun! One of the most fun puzzle games i played with Portal 1!
WoW .... If you played Portal you have to play Portal 2, amazing!
Eines der Besten Spiel für PC. lasst es euch auf keine Fall entgehen!

Once upon a time, there was an awesome first person puzzle game. It was terrific fun to play, it looked great and it built within us a distrust of cake and AI. Then, one day, that awesome game procreated with another 'roided-up version of itself from a parallel dimension (try not to think about that too much). The baby that those two games made is this masterpiece: Portal 2. If you liked Portal even the teenciest bit, get this game. Portal 2 makes the original feel like a demo. It's funnier, more impressive and more challenging. It has an excellent co-op and is hooked in to Valve's Steam Workshop, meaning thousands of glorious community-made 'tests' (maps) for free, as well as giving you access to an easy to use level builder. It's a no-brainer, get this game. Heartily recommended.
Super jeu qui reste incontournable surtout si on a joué au 1er avant. Il est magnifique ^^

I'd totally recommend this game. It's fun, challenging, exciting and highly addicting. This is a must play for anyone who loves puzzles and a great story line.

How do you improve on a perfect game? Obviously Valve did, with the sequel to Portal, which was a phenomenal game. Portal 2 is even better. Well deserving of every reward it has received. If you have not bought this or played it yet, WHY NOT? This game is brilliant.
A great game where everything that is not a test chamber puzzle is 10 times more enjoyable than the regular puzzles.

En mi opinion, de los mejores juegos de la historia, con un concepto completamente revolucionario, este juego te proporcionara varias horas de rompecabezas muy divertidos.
Ademas, una vez acabado el 'modo historia' aun tendras mucha mas diversion con el modo cooperativo!

So... Portal 2. My hopes were set pretty high for this and I was disappointed, at first, but after completing the game I realised that I was not at all disappointed and that I was just judging it harshly because I was looking at it through the jaded sequel-could-never-be-as-good-as-the-original tinted glasses. Having thrown those glasses smashing to the ground I was pleasantly surprised. I’m not saying this game pulled a Terminator 2 or anything, it was pretty much just a smooth continuation of the first game with a little more character development than the first, but that was everything I’d hoped for, and is well worth buying if you bought the first Portal game.
Great game.  Has all the humor from the first one and keeps it going throughout the whole story.

Quando fui jogar este jogo eu esperava que ele fosse bem melhor que o primeiro, que ele inovasse bastante e agora depois de tê-lo jogado posso dizer que ele foi além do que eu esperava, este jogo me surpreendeu! Vale cada centavo de dolar, muito divertido, puzzles muito bem feitos, história muito legal, eu mais do que recomendo os dois jogos de Portal.

By far the most fun you can have in a Multiplayer game. Put down the Call of Duty, kids. This is a game everyone can enjoy. The single player reminded me of Half Life 2 (very much story oriented but with some puzzles and challenging obstacles).

Ещё одна неповторимая игра от Valve. Эта замечательная игра сочитает в себе интересный сюжет, уникальные головоломки, для решения которых вам прийдётся подумать довольно нестандартно и тот самый "валвовский" юмор в диалогах и пасхалках. Так же радует возможность игры вдвоём с другом а мультиплеер это один из важнейших критериев для меня в выборе игр.
Очень рекомендую сыграть)
A game you wont regret buying!
awesome game

All that good stuff I said about Portal?  It all applies here.  Portal was one of the best games ever.  Portal 2 is one of the best sequels ever.  

Instead of rehashing the original game, or going off into a wierd, unrelated territory, Portal 2 is a faithful continuation of the original game.  Only this time, the world is larger, and the revelations are more disturbing and at the same time, hilarious.  This game strikes a careful balance between horror and humor, as you explore the remains of a monument to science gone mad.  This game may lack some of the brilliance of the original (according to some people, I didn't find it lacking at all), but it holds up very well.  And unlike Portal, this game is long, spanning 10 chapters and introduces some interesting new game play elements.  It is almost as though Portal were the prototype, and this is the full game.  

Along with the massive single-player story, there is also a co-op mode.  I want to say more, but I'm out of spaaaaaaaaace...

Unlike Portal 1, this one seems to have more of a focus on the story than the puzzles. It's still a good game, don't get me wrong, I just feel as though there could have been a little more emphasis on the puzzle aspect.

Though if you're looking for the parts that are heavily puzzle-based, they're in the co-op and in the user-created maps. Though I would still recommend going through the story mode.

I'd expect Portal 2 to have a longer lifespan than Portal 1, because there's lots of community maps out there, and people are always making more.

Gioco semplicemente epico: grafica bellissima, comparto audio coinvolgente, trama interessante e intrigante, rompicapi molto difficili. Nonostante non fosse un gioco che potrebbe spiccare sulla trama, si rivela il fulcro del gioco intero, scoprendo, col passare del tempo, che i tuoi amici non lo sono per niente. Molto bello il co-op e la possibilità di creare camere test personalizzate.

[b]Спустя 10 лет.[/b]

[h1]Portal 2 — блистательная, остроумная, исполненная с удивительным чувством вкуса и меры игра.[/h1]

Парадоксальным образом большая часть хвалебных возгласов отведена критике. Но это критика восторженных, бесконечно влюбленных в Portal людей. Это критика тех, кто прошел Portal не как запойный алкаш, за выходные, а растягивал удовольствие неделями. Это критика тех, кто летом 2010-го по три раза ходил на одну и ту же E3-презентацию, а затем пересказывал ее друзьям. Portal 2 — это, безусловно, [b]ПОБЕДА[/b]. 
Несмотря на все голливудские ужимки, безупречный юмор и возмужавший геймплей, Portal 2 остался герметичным набором пазлов, театральной научно-фантастической пьесой от первого лица. Но любим мы его от этого ничуть не меньше.

+ [u]ОТЛИЧНЫЙ СЮЖЕТ[/u]
+ [u]ПРЕЖНЯЯ МЕХАНИКА ДОПОЛНЕННАЯ НОВЫМИ КРАСКАМИ[/u]
